org.cougaar.util
Class ReusableThreadPool

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.util.ReusableThreadPool
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReusableThreadPool.TestPool
public class ReusableThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object

Provide a pool of reusable threads to reduce the overhead of construction/destruction of large numbers of standard thread, particularly on VM implementation which use OS-level thread implementations. The general contract is that wherever you might have used "new Thread()", you use "ReusableThread.newThread()" instead. Most of the Thread constructors are provided as factory methods - missing are all constructors using ThreadGroup arguments.

getAllocatedThreads

public int getAllocatedThreads()
Return the total number of threads created. This can be larger than the maximum pool size because the pool is usually allowed to create additional threads which will not be reclaimed.
